Text: Big Bone, Kentucky:  The northern extent is along Hathaway Road, and the eastern portion extends not further than U.S. 42, and is approached from that direction by Beaver Road (Route 338) coming from either Richwood or Walton.

<Text: Big Bone, Kentucky:  Big Bone took its name from a nearby prehistoric mineral lick of the same name.>
